content.query:
SELECT  *   
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK  'abfss://mg3synapsefilesystem@mg3synapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/csv-car-dataset.csv', 
        FORMAT  =   'CSV', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR  = ',', 
        ROWTERMINATOR  =   '\n'     
    ) WITH (
  [Car_Name] VARCHAR (100)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8, 
  [Year] smallint, 
  [Selling_Price] VARCHAR (100)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8, 
  [Present_Price] VARCHAR (100)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8, 
  [Kms_Driven] bigint, 
  [Fuel_Type] VARCHAR (100)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8, 
  [Seller_Type VARCHAR (100)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8, 
  [Transmission] VARCHAR (100)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8, 
  [Owner] VARCHAR (100)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
)  AS [r] 
WHERE  
  Car_Name ='ritz' AND year=2014
